        Spate is a surreal platformer by former Disney Animation 
        and Jim Henson artist Eric Provan. It's a platformer with a 
        strong focus on story and atmosphere. It's as much Mario as 
        it is Dear Esther. Spate is the journey of one man's struggle 
        and descent into madness that is fueled by his addiction to 
        absinthe following the tragic death of his daughter.
